text: tavada suddha vu kuranaya ma (siyallantama) samudiranaya kara penvana menda (niyoga karanu læba ættemi. emagin) kavurun rju margaya at kara ganneda, ohu tama paudgalika vasiya takama rju margayehi yanneya. kavurun ho (meyin) æt vuvahot (nabiye! oba e gæna kanagatu novanu). “niyata vasayenma ma biya ganva anaturu angavanneku pamani. (bala karanneku nova)” yayi pavasanu
